alert.note: Alert for Hempstead; Nevada (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 17 at 12:41PM CDT until April 17 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Hempstead County in southwestern Arkansas... Central Nevada County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 145 PM CDT. * At 1241 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hope, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Hope, Prescott, Emmet, Perrytown, Rosston, Washington, Bluff City, White Oak Lake State Park, Cale, Oakhaven, Sutton, Mount Moriah, Morris, Laneburg and Reader. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
